question: I recently had a cancerous kdney removed.  My creatinine level before surgery was 2.5 for years.  Following surgery it went to 3.6 and stayed there for 4 months   In the recent 2 months it has been moving up and is now at 4.6.  What are the causes for the creatinine level to be increasing.  My medication for mild diabetes and mild hypertension has not changed over the years.
title: high creatinine following kidney removal
